config.imagePath.description: Folder name for saving images. Relative path.
config.namingConvention.description:
Image file naming pattern.

Available placeholders:
- ${timestamp} (yyyymmddThhmmss format, e.g., 20250104T123456)
- ${seq} (auto-increment number starting from 1, e.g., 1, 2, 3)

Examples:
- image-${timestamp}
- image-${seq}

Note: If file already exists, -1, -2, ... will be appended automatically.
config.insertPattern.description: Pattern for inserting images into Markdown. Available placeholders: - ${fileName} (with extension) - ${fileNameWithoutExt} (without extension) - ${relativePath} Examples: - Markdown: ![${fileName}](${relativePath}) - HTML with width: - HTML with class:
